alert.note: Alert for Gordon; Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Murray, southeastern Whitfield and northern Gordon Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 755 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sugar Valley, or near Calhoun, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Calhoun, Chatsworth, Resaca, Carters, Ramhurst, Oostanaula, Redbud, Tilton, Audubon, Sugar Valley, Oakman, Fort Mountain State Park, Nickelsville and North Georgia Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
